originalText: Start Element
will
player
I'm sorry I almost killed ya, $(#sir/ma'am)...

::You approach a man working on a console next to one of the Dreadnoughts. The oil splotches on his coveralls quickly yank your attention toward them; the more and more you stare, the more separate and interesting shapes you manage to identify: There's a three-legged rathound, a mushroom, a stalagmite, a bat, a blob and a larger blob. However, you are interrupted when the man notices you staring at his clothes.::

Whatcha... whatcha doing there, $(#sir/ma'am)?
Need help with somethin', $(#sir/ma'am)?
context.npc_pb_will_confront
context.npc_pb_will_met
context.npc_pb_will_met
The oil splothes on your overalls form some truly interesting shapes.
Oh... Nothing, nothing. I had some questions for you.

::He laughs, revealing the few teeth he's got.:: Look over 'ere: I found Staff Sergeant Fraser on me bum! Somehow, some oil spilled on a chair, 'n' I sat on it. ::He shows you an ugly blot on his rear, one that looks like a man with a greatly oversized nose.::
Will's the name, $(#sir/ma'am). I'd love to chat, but I got lots o' work to do. If you need me to do somethin', it's okay, but otherwise, chattin' means not workin'.
I need this mutagen cans rigged in a specific way. Can you help me?
Yes, about the questions I had...
Damn it, Will! You nearly killed me!
I'll leave you to your work, Will.
Look at that beak!
That is very rude of you. Staff Sergeant's nose is not *that* big.
Okay, let's stop right here. Tell me your name?
::He inspects the cans.:: But - this is mutagen!
context.quest_pr_gasFreeDrones_riggedMutagen
mutagenD5
Sorry, $(#sir/ma'am). No time to chat, lots o' work.
::Will turns pale. It takes a moment for him to answer with a trembling voice.:: Almost killed ya? No, no, no! Wha-- what did I do wrong?
context.npc_pb_will_confront

::He laughs.:: That's what I thought at first. O', best blot ever!

Hey, name's Will, $(#sir/ma'am).

::He laughs.:: Still, it's very close! Look at it, it's huge!

By the way, name's Will, $(#sir/ma'am).
::The man slightly bows his head.:: It's Will, $(#sir/ma'am)... I was merely joking, didn't mean no harm. It's just for fun, you know.
context.quest_pr_gasFreeDrones_riggedMutagen
context.quest_pr_gasFreeDronesStarted
mutagenD5
Yes, can you help me?
That's what I said, Will. Can you help me?
Although... me tummy is showing signs of emptiness...
context.quest_pr_gasFreeDronesComplete
context.npc_pb_will_confront
You messed up the mutagen timer or something like that. It went off as soon as I activated it. I specifically instructed you to make it release the gas exactly one minute after activation.
I have some questions for you, Will.
I can, $(#sir/ma'am), I just need to know what ya need, exactly.
No, no... I'll eat later. Gotta finish this thing 'ere.

But... That's what I did, $(#sir/ma'am). Or, at least I though I did... Please forgive me, it was a mistake, $(#sir/ma'am). Please! I didn't mean to kill ya... Please forgive me! I'm sorry I messed up!
I'm afraid, I don't have much time to chat, $(#sir/ma'am). If ya need me to do somethin', it's okay, but otherwise, chattin' means not workin'.
I need you to create a mechanism that will release the gas from these two cans *exactly* one minute after it's been activated. Of course, that means you have to bind them together.
Look, I forgive you. Just don't expect me to ask for your help again, okay? Goodbye, Will. Take care.
You're an incompetent idiot, Will. I will report what happened here. We'll see how that works out for ya. Goodbye.
::Will carefully inspects the cans.:: 'Kay, $(#sir/ma'am), I can do it. It'll take some time. Ya don't mind waitin'?

Thank you, $(#sir/ma'am), thank you. Ya, ya take care too. ::You see the color slowly returning to his face. After a second or two, he turns around as if he is going to continue his work, but you notice he is only staring at the console.::
::Pale and speechless, Will lethargically turns around as if he is going to continue his work, but you notice he is only staring at the console.::
Not at all, Will. ::Wait.::

::Fortunately for you, Will finishes the job quickly. He checks once again to see if everything is connected properly then hands you the rigged mutagen cans.::

'Ere ya go, $(#sir/ma'am). Just as ya told me.
Thank you very much. See you around, Will.

::He stops you as you try to leave.:: Excuse me, $(#sir/ma'am)... it's, um... I had a question, if ya don't mind me askin'.

What's it for?
This? I'm gonna use it to kill some Free Drones, Will. Take care.
I can't tell you, Will. It's top secret. Take care.
I thought I said goodbye, Will.
O', well good luck with that, $(#sir/ma'am)!
If ya say so, $(#sir/ma'am). Good luck anyway.
$(#Sir/Ma'am). ::He nods before turning around and continuing his work.::
plot\riggedd5mutagen
